A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the finest episodes in the Star Wars franchise: a surprising and unpredictable turn full of delightful twists. Rian Johnson definitely puts his own spin on the saga and subverts the usual archetypes and well-trodden tropes of the genre with great inventivity and playfulness. A perfect send-off for the old generation (especially Carrie Fisher) and a great step forward for the new one!
